name: Super Jack
description: A super sativa! Super Jack mixes Super Silver Haze with the illustrious Jack Herer to create a sweet, spiced blend with a rich buttery aroma. The potent sativa effects spark creativity and provides an uplifting boost of energy. Super jack is a great daytime strain that will calm any anxieties and propel you through your day.
descriptionPlain: A super sativa! Super Jack mixes Super Silver Haze with the illustrious Jack Herer to create a sweet, spiced blend with a rich buttery aroma. The potent sativa effects spark creativity and provides an uplifting boost of energy. Super jack is a great daytime strain that will calm any anxieties and propel you through your day.
aka: Super Jack Herer, Super Silver Jack

highlightedReviews.text:
TLDR; incredibly clear-headed, super creative, GET-SHIT-DONE sativa. My new favorite sativa. A+

This strain is so good that smoking it convinced me finally write THIS, my very first review, after years of lurking.

I'm 33, have a wife & 2 year-old daughter, own/operate an online business and also work full-time for a medical startup doing UX, design & front end engineering.  Needless to say, I have a fairly heavy workload on any given day. 

I also take Adderall for my version of ADD.  I'd prefer to call it "wide focus", because its more about an EXCESS of attention spread across many things at once than a lack of attention.  

I have found that smoking small amounts of sativa throughout the day counteracts the negative effects of Adderall (loss of appetite, anxiety, high blood pressure).  This strain in particular has consistently left me feeling upbeat and ready to tackle any challenge in front of me.  

Being a designer, I am constantly looking for strains that invoke creativity and new ideas, and Super Jack has never failed for me. 

Super Jack is my new favorite sativa, dethroning its own father, Jack Herer.
First time Sativa - will def but again. Felt light on feet, extra calm and happy.  Wasn’t a couch lock kinda of buzz

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Gigabud, Super Jack, Silver Bubble, StarBud, and Red Diesel
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The holidays are officially in full-swing, and if you're relaxing properly, there's a good chance your stash jar is getting low. Worry not, Leafly friends: we have plenty of new strains for you to explore this weekend! Here are five strains nominated by our users who voted using the Leafly app.
For more festive suggestions, be sure to check out Leafly's Holiday Survival Guide where we point out our favorite strains for appetite stimulation, relaxation, stress relief, and more.
Go forth, rate, review, and enjoy!
   1. Gigabud
Characteristics of Gigabud:

Indica-dominant strain
G13 hybrid
Earthy, apricot aroma
Induces happy, sleepy effects

   2. Super Jack
Characteristics of Super Jack:

Mostly sativa strain
Cross between Super Silver Haze and Jack Herer
Sweet, spicy, buttery aroma
Creative and uplifting

   3. Silver Bubble
Characteristics of Silver Bubble:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Haze, Northern Lights, and Skunk
Breeder: DNA Genetics
Spicy sandalwood aroma

   4. StarBud
Characteristics of StarBud:

Mostly indica strain
Originated from a mystery clone out of the Midwestern United States
Breeder: HortiLab
Relaxing, sleepy body effects

   5. Red Diesel
Characteristics of Red Deisel:

Hybrid strain
Cross between NYC Diesel and California Indica
Breeder: Barney's Farm
Powerful euphoric effects with an energetic rush
